title.narrative: Procurement of Goods for Tax Administration - Compliance and Taxpayer Services (TACTS)

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of Goods for Tax Administration - Compliance and Taxpayer Services (TACTS)) is a component of Tax Administration - Compliance and Taxpayer Services (TACTS) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of goods' and a budget of £409,861. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Domestic revenue mobilisation. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, PwC. The start date is 18-10-2010 and the end date is 30-06-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
